players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Diana: "That's a bold accusation, Bob. Why would you investigate me on night one instead of a more suspicious player like Alice?"
You: "Bob, if you're the detective, who did you investigate and what did you find? Diana, why are you trying to redirect suspicion to me?"
Diana: "Alice, if Bob were truly the detective, he would have investigated someone more logical than me on night one. He's trying to frame me because he's the real mafia and knows I'm town."
You: "Diana, if Bob is lying, he's mafia. But if he's telling the truth, you are. We have to vote one of you out to test this. I'm leaning towards trusting Bob's claim for now."
Bob: "Diana is deflecting. As detective, I had to start somewhere, and my investigation revealed her guilt. Alice is right—we must vote Diana out to confirm my claim and eliminate the mafia threat."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Diana: "That's a bold accusation, Bob. Why would you investigate me on night one instead of a more suspicious player like Alice?"
Alice: "Bob, if you're the detective, who did you investigate and what did you find? Diana, why are you trying to redirect suspicion to me?"
Diana: "Alice, if Bob were truly the detective, he would have investigated someone more logical than me on night one. He's trying to frame me because he's the real mafia and knows I'm town."
Alice: "Diana, if Bob is lying, he's mafia. But if he's telling the truth, you are. We have to vote one of you out to test this. I'm leaning towards trusting Bob's claim for now."
You: "Diana is deflecting. As detective, I had to start somewhere, and my investigation revealed her guilt. Alice is right—we must vote Diana out to confirm my claim and eliminate the mafia threat."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
